channel.title: Itzscape V5 (AKA Lucifer's Hell Contd)
channel.description:
Hello, I am going to get back into private servers. I'm going to start where I left off at Itzscape V5. This server will be fully SQL integrated. It will be ran off of a dedicated server. If you wish to leave a suggestion please do and I will see about adding it into the server. Please do not apply for a position if you are not fully qualified
Objectives
*Clean out everything that's not used *Organize everything *Make server more efficient at handling large amounts of people. *If we make a client make our own cache for use with it instead of hard coding the models into it. *Make this server fully SQL *Have online logs and information *Stop Admins and staff from trading, Dueling, Banking, Killing, etc. (To make gameplay fair)
Positions Available
Client Programmers[code]
*Lusfr_ *xx qwertyuiop xx *`Lewk_ * * * *[/code]
Server Programmers[code]
*Lusfr_ *Pie' *xx qwertyuiop xx *`Lewk_ * * *[/code]
If you are accepted I will post so on this thread along with your application and it will be the same if you are denied.
[size=15pt][b]Suggestions[/b][/size][code] * * * * *[/code]
[code]Application
1. What is your character name in game? (Must start with Mod)
2. How old are you?
3. Which time zone you are in? (e.g. GMT, GMT +2)
4. How many hours a week (approximately) do you think you can you contribute to your duty?
5. Have you ever been involved in any disciplinary offence on this server?
6. What qualities do you possess that can be beneficial to our server and the staff?
7. Imagine you are staff, and you witness one player being abusive to another on the world chat channel. What do you do?
8. What do you think is the most important thing to remember in carrying out your duty?
9. What do you think is the least important thing to remember in carrying out your duty?
10. Do you have any experience with Java (If so list)?
11. Which do you think is more important: answering questions or moderating the World chat? Why?
12. Is there any other information that you would like to add that you feel will further your application?[/code]
[quote="Tico"]Approved.[/quote]

item.title: Itzscape V5 (AKA Lucifer's Hell Contd)
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“primadude, post:12, topic:292525”][quote author=Lusfr link=topic=386468.msg2896743#msg2896743 date=1249257334]
A lot of people do but i’m gong to work on this right. Doing it by myself would take too long
[/quote]

Don’t recruit the wrong people. Most of the people will probably be idle in the team, and stay that way, and will end up doing nothing at all. 99% of development teams fail. - Just a heads up.[/quote]

Don’t worry I have had many development teams and if your idle for more then 2 days youll get booted

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:15, topic:292525”][code]1. What is your character name in game? (Must start with Mod)
Mod Tabby

  1. How old are you?
    13

  2. Which time zone you are in? (e.g. GMT, GMT +2)
    New Zealand Time

  3. How many hours a week (approximately) do you think you can you contribute to your duty?
    Nearlly everyday

  4. Have you ever been involved in any disciplinary offence on this server?
    No

  5. What qualities do you possess that can be beneficial to our server and the staff?
    N/A

  6. Imagine you are staff, and you witness one player being abusive to another on the world chat channel. What do you do?
    Warn them about what they are doing and if they Continue then I take it as they are not Paying Attention and use Force

  7. What do you think is the most important thing to remember in carrying out your duty?
    Keeping the Place Clean from any Misbehaviour

  8. What do you think is the least important thing to remember in carrying out your duty?
    Socialality with other Staff, unless theres a Scene on

  9. Do you have any experience with Java (If so list)?
    Im a little good at Coding and I can be a little Useful, still learning it atm

  10. Which do you think is more important: answering questions or moderating the World chat? Why?
    Answering Questions because ive been through and mostly everyone has been through when Staff wont listen to you and its very Confusing

  11. Is there any other information that you would like to add that you feel will further your application?
    Uhm just to say that ive been Staff for many Reasons and haven’t been Demoted once, only because the Server was Reset, if you need anything or just want to get back to me then Message me and I will give you my MSN or anything that we should be able to Chat with.[/code][/quote]

I’m more looking with people that have some exp.

The Soul:

Haha, so you did indeed find your password. Good luck.

yep sure did

Read full topic

item.title: Itzscape V5 (AKA Lucifer's Hell Contd)
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:5, topic:292525"]Holy shit, I have nothing to do with my time anymore D:

  1. What is your character name in game? (Must start with Mod) [Mod] Lewk?

  2. How old are you? 16, Turning 17 in a few weeks.

  3. Which time zone you are in? (e.g. GMT, GMT +2) GMT

  4. How many hours a week (approximately) do you think you can you contribute to your duty? 14 - 16ish

  5. Have you ever been involved in any disciplinary offence on this server? Nope.

  6. What qualities do you possess that can be beneficial to our server and the staff? Well, I’m rather helpful at times, Easy going, Easy to talk to. I can follow instructions clearly ect.

  7. Imagine you are staff, and you witness one player being abusive to another on the world chat channel. What do you do? I’d stop it. Players should be treated fairly and like human beings.

  8. What do you think is the most important thing to remember in carrying out your duty? To be as helpful as possible.

  9. What do you think is the least important thing to remember in carrying out your duty? Myself, I usually put others in front of me.

  10. Do you have any experience with Java (If so list)? Yes, I do. I’ve been programming since I was 14. Ever since then I’ve been taking a few Java classes.

  11. Which do you think is more important: answering questions or moderating the World chat? Why? Moderating the world chat. Questions can be answered by other members. If the community is having trouble answering the question, I’d take some time to answer it for that person.

  12. Is there any other information that you would like to add that you feel will further your application? HOLY FUCK ITS LUSFR[/quote]

Approved

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:6, topic:292525”]Oh, wow, you’re back. Long time no see!
I think I’d like to help out with this, here’s my application.

[quote]

  1. What is your character name in game? (Must start with Mod)
    Mod Evan

  2. How old are you?
    I’m 15, turning 16 next month.

  3. Which time zone you are in? (e.g. GMT, GMT +2)
    GMT -5

  4. How many hours a week (approximately) do you think you can you contribute to your duty?
    ~15

  5. Have you ever been involved in any disciplinary offence on this server?
    No.

  6. What qualities do you possess that can be beneficial to our server and the staff?
    I can follow instructions and assist other members with any problems they may be having.

  7. Imagine you are staff, and you witness one player being abusive to another on the world chat channel. What do you do?
    I would give that player a warning, and if they refused to stop I would take further action against their account.

  8. What do you think is the most important thing to remember in carrying out your duty?
    To dedicate myself to doing so as effectively as possible.

  9. What do you think is the least important thing to remember in carrying out your duty?
    Myself. I’ll always take the time to help someone with any problems they may be experiencing.

  10. Do you have any experience with Java (If so list)?
    I’ve been hosting and coding servers for about 2 years now. I had my own server for about a year
    and I’ve been hosting and coding servers for other people as well.

  11. Which do you think is more important: answering questions or moderating the World chat? Why?
    I think that moderating the world chat is more important, as other members will probably be able to
    answer most questions that anyone may have. If, however, someone is unable to find an answer to a
    question I will try to answer it for them.

  12. Is there any other information that you would like to add that you feel will further your application?
    I haven’t really touched any Runescape clients in a while, so it would probably be better to give me
    a position in the Server Development team.
    [/quote][/quote]
    Approved

Read full topic

1. What is your character name in game? (Must start with Mod) Mod Evan

  1. How old are you?

    ~15

    I can follow instructions and assist other members with any problems they may be having.

  6. Imagine you are staff, and you witness one player being abusive to another on the world chat channel. What do you do?
    I would give that player a warning, and if they refused to stop I would take further action against their account.

  7. What do you think is the most important thing to remember in carrying out your duty?
    To dedicate myself to doing so as effectively as possible.

  8. What do you think is the least important thing to remember in carrying out your duty?
    Myself. I’ll always take the time to help someone with any problems they may be experiencing.

  9. Do you have any experience with Java (If so list)?
    I’ve been hosting and coding servers for about 2 years now. I had my own server for about a year
    and I’ve been hosting and coding servers for other people as well.

  10. Which do you think is more important: answering questions or moderating the World chat? Why?
    I think that moderating the world chat is more important, as other members will probably be able to
    answer most questions that anyone may have. If, however, someone is unable to find an answer to a
    question I will try to answer it for them.

  11. Is there any other information that you would like to add that you feel will further your application?
